channel.title: When Around 40 People Log On..It Says "Error Connecting To Server" Help Please
channel.description: Ok when like 40-50 people log on it gives me the message "Error Connecting To Server" when I try logging on. Sometimes it's 40 other times it's like 35 or 50 players. It all ranges..The more the players, the harder it is to get on...You can get on though you just have to sit there a while clicking login and it's hard. it also lowers my percentage on the moparscape server status page. Is there something I can do to fix it or allow more people on before it does that?

item.title: When Around 40 People Log On..It Says "Error Connecting To Server" Help Please
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Nooooo I wasn’t calling you the dummy lol…I was quoting that other guy.

Read full topic

item.title: When Around 40 People Log On..It Says "Error Connecting To Server" Help Please
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

The problem could simply be, The server’s maximum amount of players has been reached,
If so, just edit the maximum amount,

This is only if you cannot login, Or if the whole server Disconnects.

Read full topic

Deltascape source I know.

or ddsspeced[/quote]

That’s not the problem “dummy”. I said it ranges and it’s random. Sometimes its 50…others it’s 35…

Read full topic

item.title: When Around 40 People Log On..It Says "Error Connecting To Server" Help Please
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

Okay i am not sure if this is right but it seems like the problem.
Open up playerHandler.java and search for public static final int maxPlayers = 50;
Now replace the 50 with like 100 or a high amount. This will let 100 people on your server as apposed to the current amount that you have

If you can not find that code look for maybe 40 or just search public static final int maxPlayers =

Hope i helped

Read full topic
